ComicInfo.Summary:
Five never-before-seen stories from the Belcher family! Tina goes Gothic… and accidentally unleashes a dangerous Franken-Butt; Louise discovers what it’s like to disappear; Bob turns some of his favorite films into burgers; Linda delivers a demo tape and some album art; and Gene unveils “Chupacabra-Cadabra, The Musical.”
Story TitlesTina's Erotic Friend Fiction Presents: Franken-Butt
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-01 15:37:14. [CVDB470439]
ComicInfo.Writer: Chad Brewster, Jeff Drake, Justin Hook, Mike Olsen, Rachel Hastings
ComicInfo.Penciller: Cecilia Aranovicho, Frank Forte, Hector Reynoso, Kyung Shin, Robin Brigstocke, Steven Theis, Tony Gennaro, Tyler Garrison
ComicInfo.Inker: Cecilia Aranovicho, Frank Forte, Hector Reynoso, Kyung Shin, Robin Brigstocke, Steven Theis, Tony Gennaro, Tyler Garrison
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Belcher, Gene Belcher, Linda Belcher, Louise Belcher, Tina Belcher
